Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Vase for cosmetics
Description: Vase for cosmetics with a wide circular orifice and a slightly flared upper body. There are two white bands on the body. The white, flat circular base appears to be independent from the body. There are numerous traces of cosmetic paint on the bottom and the inner walls.
